name: Artnet
info:
# Art-Net encoder/decoder

This sublow is a bi-directional Art-Net encoder/decoder.

## Receiving

Connect a `udp in` object set to port *6454* to the input of the subflow.  
The Art-Net data will be output as `msg.payload` in Buffer form.  
The universe is available as `msg.topic`.

## Sending

Send an `Array` or `Buffer` to the Art-Net subflow and connect the sublow's output to a `udp out` object set to port *6454*.
The universe must be set as `msg.topic`.

name: Download channels and values in JSON
Artnet
Init DMX Patch
func:
var patch = global.get("dmxPatch");
if (patch === undefined){
    patch = [];
                //if addinging channels you will need to add to "Patch 1 to 1 and BO"
    for (var i = 0; i < 61; i++){
        patch[i] = {"address":i + 1,"value":0, "historical":0, "type": "dimmer"};
    }

    global.set("dmxPatch", patch); 
}

// Index is channel, right side equals is address
patch[0].address = 0; // 	Kitchen Main Cans				
patch[1].address = 1; // 	Kitchen Over Sink

name: Clock on UI
format:
<script id="clockScript" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;

    $(function () {
        $('#clockScript').parent().hide();
        
        if(clockInterval) return;
        
        var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
        var div = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');
        
        div.append(p);
        div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
        
        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString()); 
        }
        
        toolbar.append(div);
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);
    });
</script>

name: Moved to Mosquitto
info:
Mosco failed to run on multiple occasions so moved back to Mosquitto
Need to add the following to mosquitto.conf file. ETC/mosquitto
allow_anonymous true
listener 1883
